name: Infinite Lexicon of Demons
description:
Open this book if you dare and witness the worst inhabitants Hell has to offer. Their ranks are infinite -- pray you don't find yourself turning pages FOREVER! 

A word of caution for the fool-hardy: Dare not attempt to speak the names herein contained, for one slip of thy mortal tongue will find you ravaged by that beast's  curses for all eternity. 

Enjoy! 

Made with https://flowlab.io/
